game.name: ONE PIECE Bounty Rush

game.shortDescription: 해적이라면 빼앗아라―― 최대 플레이어 4 vs 4로 펼쳐지는 팀 대전 액션 등장. 팀의 전략이 승패를 좌우하는 베리 탈취 대전 게임입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take the loot, pirates! Bounty Rush is a 4 vs 4 multiplayer team action game. Work with your team to capture the other teams' berries!

reviewHighlights.text: its fun but so unbalanced with matchmaking . and its pay to win or wait a year or longer to stand a chance of beating ex characters
